comment: /**  * Create, configure and return the {@code LoadTimeWeaver} instance to be used. Note  * that it is unnecessary to annotate this method with {@code @Bean}, because the  * object returned will automatically be registered as a bean by  * {@link LoadTimeWeavingConfiguration#loadTimeWeaver()}  */
code: /**  * Create, configure and return the {@code LoadTimeWeaver} instance to be used. Note  * that it is unnecessary to annotate this method with {@code @Bean}, because the  * object returned will automatically be registered as a bean by  * {@link LoadTimeWeavingConfiguration#loadTimeWeaver()}  */ LoadTimeWeaver getLoadTimeWeaver().
